title: IIT Patna Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Patna (IIT Patna) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Patna Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last ...
